title: SoundEffect

name: SoundEffect
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  SoundEffect is the base class that all other sound effects derive from. A
  SoundEffect can be applied to either a Class.Sound or Class.SoundGroup by
  being parented to either.
description: |
  SoundEffect is the base class that all other sound effects derive from. A
  SoundEffect can be applied to either a Class.Sound or Class.SoundGroup by
  being parented to either. Multiple effects can be applied to the same Sound or
  SoundGroup. The order the effects will be applied in is determined by that
  effect's Priority.
codesamples: []

  - Instance
descendants:
  - ChorusSoundEffect
  - CompressorSoundEffect
  - DistortionSoundEffect
  - EchoSoundEffect
  - EqualizerSoundEffect
  - FlangeSoundEffect
  - PitchShiftSoundEffect
  - ReverbSoundEffect
  - TremoloSoundEffect
tags:
  - NotCreatable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: SoundEffect.Enabled
    summary: |
      Toggles the effect on and off.
    description: |
      Toggles the effect on and off. True by default.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - LegacySound
  - name: SoundEffect.Priority
    summary: |
      Determines the order the effect will be applied in relation to other
      effects.
    description: |
      Determines the order the effect will be applied in relation to other
      effects. Higher priority effects will be applied earlier. The exception is
      when Priority equals 0 (which is the default). In this case, the base
      priority for the effect will be used. If the priority of two effects are
      equal, then the order is undetermined.
    codesamples: []
    type: int
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - LegacySound
